welcome.subject: Welcome to {{companyName}} - Your First Day Information
welcome.body:
Dear {{firstName}},

Welcome to {{companyName}}! We're excited to have you join our team as {{title}} in the {{department}} department.

Your first day is {{startDate}}, and we've prepared everything you need to get started:

**What to expect on your first day:**
- Arrival time: {{arrivalTime}}
- Location: {{officeAddress}}
- Your manager: {{managerName}} ({{managerEmail}})
- IT setup will be completed by our team

**Your accounts and access:**
- Email: {{email}}
- Username: {{username}}
- Temporary password will be provided on your first day

**Important first-day items to bring:**
- Valid photo ID
- Completed tax and employment forms (if not already submitted)
- Banking information for direct deposit

If you have any questions before your start date, please don't hesitate to reach out to HR at {{hrEmail}} or your manager {{managerName}}.

We look forward to seeing you on {{startDate}}!

Best regards,
{{companyName}} Team

managerNotification.subject: Employee Exit Process Started: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
managerNotification.body:
Hi {{managerFirstName}},

This notification confirms that the offboarding process has been initiated for {{firstName}} {{lastName}}.

**Departing Employee Details:**
- Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
- Position: {{title}}
- Department: {{department}}
- Last Working Day: {{lastDay}}
- Reason: {{reason}}

**Important Manager Tasks:**
- Conduct exit interview (if applicable)
- Review and approve final time entries in Autotask
- Transfer active projects and responsibilities
- Document critical knowledge
- Collect all company equipment
- Complete manager's portion of exit checklist

**IT Offboarding Timeline:**
- Account access will be disabled at EOD on {{lastDay}}
- Email will be {{emailAction}} for {{emailRetention}} days
- Company data will be backed up before account closure

**Autotask Ticket:** #{{ticketNumber}}

Please coordinate with IT if you need:
- Extended access for knowledge transfer
- Email forwarding to specific team members
- Access to specific files or projects after departure

For questions about the offboarding process, contact HR at {{hrEmail}} or IT at {{itEmail}}.

Best regards,
IT Automation System
